There’s been a lot of discussion about #COVID19 conspiracy theories in the news here this week. 

In this article we discuss how to have ‘the talk’ with family & friends. 

Read more here :right_arrow_selector: https://t.co/3miZRsMsnO #vaccines #FactChecking #ThinkCheckShare https://t.co/4a9xjRraVk
